nodes.text: Wertsnik was a male Trandoshan soldier and a member of Mynnic's band of adventurers around 32 BBY. He was a veteran of many battles.

He died sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY during an outbreak of the Blackwing virus on Dathomir. After his death, his undead body was controlled by the virus and kept walking around in the Quarantine Zone until it was destroyed by a spacer.
